field.name: summary
field.value: Initialization of Velocity engine is not working in ASP.NET web project not using IIS

field.name: description
field.value: I am using NVelocity for generating emails for users. Problem is that I am not running my web on IIS but using VS.NET built-in WebServer. I always got a message saying "Error loading directive.properties! Something is very wrong if these properties aren't being located. Either your Velocity distribution is incomplete or your Velocity jar file is corrupted! The invoked member is not supported in a dynamic assembly.". So I looked in the source code and the problem is on line 53 in ResourceLocator class "String[] names = a.GetManifestResourceNames();". I noticed some performace problem in the same class traversing all the referenced assemblies included those from .NET framework (which makes no sense to me, because you cannot add resources to them). Thanks for reply Karel Frajták
